Looking to login to the Schoology app?

Login Register

Part of the PowerSchool Personalized Learning Cloud

Schoology Learning

K-12 Learning Management System

A centralized hub for personalized teaching and learning that connects teachers, students, and families in a single platform.

Watch a Demo

PowerBuddy for Learning

PowerBuddy for Learning is the personal assistant for teaching and learning. PowerBuddy makes educators’ lives easier by helping them easily create high-quality assignments and instructional content. Students benefit from an always-available personalized assistant to support them in the way they choose to learn.

Learn More

K-12 Classroom Management Platform Buying Guide

Learn how an interoperable and user-friendly classroom management system is the best way to unify data and personalize instruction for each student.

Get the Guide

Create Personalized Pathways and Experiences That Serve the Needs of the Whole Child

Schoology supports learners of all levels, across various learning models and modalities while enabling districts and schools to standardize, allowing teachers to create personalized pathways and experiences that serve the needs of the whole child.

Provide a Personalized Learning Hub

Connect students, families, teachers, and the community to learning across your entire district. More than just assignments and messaging and calendars, Schoology Learning is a one-stop-platform for educators to personalize your district’s curriculum to the needs of each student.

Support Equity and Access

Enhance student accessibility with built-in tools such as Microsoft Immersive Reader and a unique early learner experience. Support equity of learning via centrally-managed course templates and shared resources to ensure all teachers have access to consistent, high-quality content that supports student outcomes.

Empower Students

With flexible learning spaces, tailored content, and a mastery-based approach, students are empowered to engage in all kinds of resources to support and enhance their own learning.

Increase Family Engagement

Support closer connections between the classroom, district, and home by giving families a central place to engage with their child’s learning. Available online or through the Schoology Learning mobile app, families can take part in their child’s education from the devices they have.

Learn how PowerSchool Schoology Learning fits into our new Personalized Learning Cloud. Provide everything an Academic team needs all in one place!

Learn More

The Leading K-12 Learning Management System

Leverage a complete set of online teaching and assessment tools needed for today’s learning environments—all in one integrated platform.

Schoology Groups & Resources
  • Schoology Groups & Resources
  • Enhanced Elementary Experience
  • Industry Leading Integration with SIS
  • Integrated Lesson Planner

Save teachers time with dynamic lesson planning and promote communication and collaboration among students, parents, and organizations like sports teams, clubs, and parent-teacher associations.

Create a "just-right" experience for younger learners through a student interface designed to reduce cognitive load and provide multiple options for showing mastery. Students have access to only the activities they need in a singular, personalized location.

Traditional grades will automatically sync between Schoology and any major SIS providers, saving teachers from duplicate entry. Schools and districts who use PowerSchool SIS can additionally take advantage the automatic syncing and passback of attendance, traditional grades, and standards-based grades.

Save teachers time with centralized lesson planning and increase collaboration. Track towards standards, monitor lesson progression, and adjust to different rotations and off-days. Lessons can be viewed and edited anywhere on iOS and Android, and can be shared easily with colleagues, students, and parents.

With a comprehensive program to protect the security and integrity of our applications—including robust cloud security, security by design, third-party penetration testing, and a responsible disclosure program—all validated by independent third-party auditors, PowerSchool demonstrates our commitment to protecting our customer’s data.

Success Story

Springfield Platteview Community Schools

Springfield, NE
Springfield Platteview Community Schools

Springfield, NE

Schoology has given us the ability to be consistent on how we do business across all grade levels, K through 12. It’s given us direction for our technology professional development so that we can supply our teachers with direct and meaningful learning opportunities. I love how easy it is for students, parents, and teachers to learn how to use the system. By the second year of adoption, we were able to have 95 percent of our teachers using Schoology every day.

Jeremy Mahoney Director of Instruction Technology
Springfield Platteview Community Schools
